Class IndexQuery

  • java.lang.Object

public abstract class IndexQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a JE Backend Query.

      • evaluate

        public abstract EntryIDSet evaluate(java.util.List<Message> debugMessages)
        Evaluates the index query and returns the EntryIDSet.
        Parameters:
        debugMessages - If not null, diagnostic messages will be written which will help to determine why the returned EntryIDSet is not defined.
        Returns:
        The EntryIDSet as a result of evaulation of this query.
